Step Forward: 2017-2018
Congratulations!
We have reviewed your application and are pleased to let you know that you have been successful in making it to the next stage of the assessment process.
What next?
We're currently busy matching young people with our exciting and varied employers for the 2016 - 2017 programme. We'll be in touch with you in September to invite you to an assessment. The assessment is nothing to worry about; it's just a great opportunity for us to find out more about you and for you to learn more about Step Forward. In the meantime, like us on facebook and follow us on twitter to keep up to date with the latest news from Step Forward. Have a great summer! Important note You have applied for the Step Forward programme from Sept 2016 - Sept 2017. If you are leaving school or college this year and would like to start Step Forward this September you should contact us immediately on step.forward@the-challenge.org or call 020 3542 2404 and we're option 5.
